content:
Q: What is so special about Maid Protect360 PRO?
A: Maid Protect360 PRO is designed for you and your helper. It provides comprehensive benefits to protect the maid which include Personal Accident, Hospital and Surgical Expenses, Replacement Maid Services, Insurance Guarantee Bond, Personal Liability to Third Parties and other benefits. In addition, your helper gets dental and medical coverage, alternative maid services and the waiver of co-payment. Your helper can also enjoy a subsidised rate for dental and GP medical consultation at our panel of clinics. In addition to the comprehensive insurance coverage mentioned above, Maid Protect360 PRO also provides you with optional coverage under Enhanced Medical Benefits which includes: Critical Illness up to $10,000 Mobility Aid Reimbursement up to $500 Free medical teleconsultation up to 3 times for you and 3 times your helper annually
questions: How does Maid Protect360 PRO balance coverage between the employer and the helper in terms of Personal Accident, Hospital and Surgical Expenses, and Replacement Maid Services?
What are the specific benefits provided to the helper under Maid Protect360 PRO that differ from the employer's coverage, particularly regarding dental and medical services?
In what ways does the waiver of co-payment for the helper under Maid Protect360 PRO affect the overall out-of-pocket expenses during medical consultations?
How does the subsidised rate for dental and GP medical consultations at panel clinics work for the helper, and what conditions or limitations might apply?
What types of incidents or claims would be covered under the Insurance Guarantee Bond included in Maid Protect360 PRO, and how does this benefit the employer?
How does the Personal Liability to Third Parties coverage protect the employer or helper, and what scenarios might trigger this benefit?
What are the conditions and limits for the Replacement Maid Services benefit, and how does it operate in the event the original helper is unable to work?
How does the optional Enhanced Medical Benefits coverage integrate with the base Maid Protect360 PRO plan, and what additional protections does it offer?
What are the eligibility criteria and claim procedures for the Critical Illness coverage up to $10,000 under the Enhanced Medical Benefits option?
How is the Mobility Aid Reimbursement up to $500 applied, and what documentation or proof is required to claim this benefit?
What are the terms and limitations of the free medical teleconsultation service provided up to 3 times annually for both the employer and the helper?
Are there any exclusions or conditions under Maid Protect360 PRO that would limit coverage for pre-existing medical conditions or specific types of injuries?
How does Maid Protect360 PRO handle claims related to dental treatments, and are there any restrictions on the types of dental procedures covered?
In the event of a medical emergency overseas, does Maid Protect360 PRO provide coverage for hospital and surgical expenses, and what are the claim requirements?
What documentation is required to support claims for Replacement Maid Services, and how does the insurer verify the necessity of such services?
How does the plan address coverage for alternative maid services, and under what circumstances can the helper access these services?
What is the process for claiming Personal Accident benefits under Maid Protect360 PRO, and how are benefits calculated in case of permanent disability or death?
Does the plan provide any coverage or benefits related to quarantine or COVID-19 related medical expenses for the helper or employer?
How does the insurance guarantee bond function in relation to government or regulatory requirements for employing a maid, and what risks does it mitigate?
Are there any age limits or eligibility restrictions for the helper to be covered under Maid Protect360 PRO, especially concerning the optional Enhanced Medical Benefits?
